content.title: BPL Scholarship for College Students
content.department: Department of Higher Education, Government of Chhattisgarh
content.details: The objective of the scheme is to provide financial assistance to meritorious students from BPL category families to meet a part of their day-to-day expenses while pursuing higher studies.
benefits: ₹500/- per month for Post Graduate Level (PG) students
₹300/- per month for Graduate Level (UG) students
Full scholarship for renewal applicants: ₹3000 for UG Classes and ₹5000 for PG Classes
Scholarship disbursed through Direct Benefit Transfer (DBT) mode
eligibility: Students of Graduate Level (UG) & Post Graduate Level (PG) studying in any Government college of Chhattisgarh
Guardian should have a BPL Card
Not receiving benefits from any other scholarship scheme
Must pass the annual examination in the first attempt
content.application_process: Online submission of the application form through the National Scholarship Portal.

faqs.question: Can I edit the information already saved and up to what time?
faqs.answer: Applicants can edit the information till the final submission of the online application. After final submission, information can only be edited if marked as defected at the verification level.

faqs.question: Do I have to fill up the online application in one sitting?
faqs.answer: No. Applicants can fill out the online application in many settings until satisfied with the entries.

faqs.question: What should I do if I forget my Temporary ID/Permanent ID?
faqs.answer: Use the process: 'Student login-->Forgot Registration Details?' and enter the basic fields to retrieve your ID.

faqs.question: How should I check the status of my application online?
faqs.answer: Login under 'Student Login' with your Permanent ID and Password, then select 'Check Your Status'.

faqs.question: Where to lodge complaints/queries/grievances regarding scholarship application?
faqs.answer: Technical complaints may be addressed to the Helpdesk of the National Scholarship Portal.
